page.title: 02A DAY IN THE LIFE OF PETER
page.content: At 7:30 am I put on my clothes. I usually have bran flakes and orange juice. At 8:10 am I go off to {school} where we do Maths and Language. At 10:30 am we have playtime. When we come in we finish our work and read a book.At 12:10 pm we have{lunch.}I sometimes have a sandwich ,a Mars Bar and crisps.We then have playtime when we play marbles ,tig, football and chainy! We have to go in early because we have gym.At{gym}we have to do things on the apparatus and do gymnastics.Then we do {project}work and chose an{activity.}We set off for home at 3:10. At home I do my{homework}and then watch{TV.}We have tea after which I do my{music practice.}Sometimes I play outside then watch more TV and then it's off to bed at 8:30.
